snippet.title: Tail Concerto Battle [テイルコンチェルトバトル] Game Sample - PC/Doujin
snippet.description:
Tail Concerto Battle [テイルコンチェルトバトル] Game Sample - PC/Doujin

Tail Concerto Battle is a pretty old, unfinished FM2nd game that isn't very good tbh, but I felt compelled to make a video for it since the fact that someone would even want to make a fighting game out of it makes it a curiousity. I played (and enjoyed) the original Playstation game many years ago, but when Tail Concerto 2 was announced for PS2 and then disappeared without a trace (with only one concept and game somewhat related to it released much later, "Mamoru-kun" and "Solatorobo", part of what is called the "Little Tail Bronx" series), I found my copy of TC just collecting dust. Thankfully, it looks like Solatorobo will be coming out overseas (if it hasn't already, I haven't checked).

Anyhoo, this game allows you to play with most of the important characters of Tail Concerto and guest stars Klonoa (from his own great "Klonoa" series) and Ran-oh (from another doujin title, "Tales of Moon"). They have basic attacks and combo strings and there are a few stages, but the game is significantly incomplete. This is a video using the valiant "Cyan Garland". You can get this game at:

http://www009.upp.so-net.ne.jp/bujin/
(Click the "Game" Link in the upper-left, click the game below "Metal Soul", and you'll go to the main page, then click the picture with Waffle, etc.)

UPDATE: Apparently, the dev has changed their website, or the website is down. You can get the game at:

http://www.mediafire.com/file/oi0a4u1kgj0czid/Tail+Concerto+Battle.zip
